name: Chef Kabir
bio: Chef A is a seafood specialist who loves experimenting with different types of seafood. With over 10 years of experience in cooking seafood, Chef A is known for his/her unique and flavorful dishes that are loved by seafood enthusiasts.

name: Chef Nahid
bio: Chef B is a vegetarian chef who loves creating delicious and nutritious vegetarian dishes. With over 8 years of experience in vegetarian cooking, Chef B is known for his/her innovative and flavorful dishes that are loved by vegetarians and non-vegetarians alike.

name: Chef Saif Hasan
bio: Chef C is an Indian chef who loves creating authentic and delicious Indian dishes. With over 12 years of experience in Indian cooking, Chef C is known for his/her use of traditional Indian spices and techniques to create flavorful and aromatic dishes that transport you to India.

name: Chef Kishwar Chowdhury
bio: Chef D is an Italian chef who loves creating authentic and delicious Italian dishes. With over 15 years of experience in Italian cooking, Chef D is known for his/her use of fresh ingredients and traditional Italian techniques to create mouth-watering dishes that transport you to Italy.

name: Chef Tony
bio: Chef E is a Chinese chef who specializes in creating delicious and authentic Chinese dishes. With over 10 years of experience in Chinese cooking, Chef E is known for his/her mastery of Chinese cooking techniques and use of fresh ingredients to create flavorful dishes that are both healthy and satisfying.

name: Shelly Nuruzzaman
bio: Chef F is a Thai chef who specializes in creating delicious and authentic Thai dishes. With over 8 years of experience in Thai cooking, Chef F is known for his/her use of fresh ingredients and unique blend of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors to create dishes that are both bold and refreshing.
